response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It's not just an item; it's an investment in efficiency and quality that could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value to you, I believe we can come to a fair agreement. I am offering the product to you for $14,000. This price reflects the balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring you receive a valuable asset at a reasonable cost. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 14000}
